description: BehaVR develops general wellness and digital therapeutics (DTx) virtual reality experiences to help users address stress, pain, addiction and other mental health issues.

Belatrix Software helps companies thrive in the digital world by turning their ideas into high quality, innovative software based on highly-tuned Agile development processes. Belatrix was acquired by Globant in 2019.
Beleza Natural is a beauty salon business specializing in tightly-curled and wavy hair, which created and patented treatments and an innovative process of applying the product.
Bellísima offers a range of innovative cosmetic products and beauty tools for the modern woman who looks to experiment and have fun with many hair colors and styles.
Ben & Frank is a fashionable and affordable eyewear brand in Mexico.
BenCorp provides strategic tools to boost health businesses, including occupational health management, reduction in health insurance costs, and benefits management.
Beonprice is a Revenue Management solution system. Based on advanced Big Data technology, Beonprice facilitates and optimizes price management decisions in the hotel industry.
Bercia imports construction and decoration materials for corporate clients, specializing in green-building solutions including for major projects with LEED certification.
Beso Francés is Peru’s 1st fast-casual creperie chain, offering a unique French experience that brings the essence of Parisian romance to Lima.
Bigbox alleviates the pressure from gift givers to find the “perfect” gift by curating unique portfolios from experiences.
With its algorithmic fortune teller and psychic marketplace offerings, Binnaz connects individuals to fortune-based entertainment every day.
Bio Insumos Nativa is a biotechnology company dedicated to the development, production and commercialization of organic agricultural products in Latin America.

Bioelements manufactures and sells biodegradable packaging products, which are made using a proprietary resin, BioE-8, that reduces the degradation of packaging materials from 400 years (plastic) to 6-20 months.

description: bioFeeder’s SaaS / IoT platform enables farms to improve shrimp growth and survival rates by releasing food into their ponds incrementally via connected feeders.
BioFiltro has created an energy-efficient, chemical-free, low-cost, and odorless wastewater treatment technology using earthworms and bacteria.
Bioled provides salmon farms with specialized LED lamps and expertise in photoperiodic systems to increase the volume and quality of the fish they produce.

BitPay facilitates the entire cryptocurrency transaction process, allowing consumers to acquire and spend Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash, and supplying merchants and enterprises with the capacity to accept and disburse blockchain payments.
Blessing’s shops offer ready-made and customizable gifts, chocolate, and party favors, tailored for special occasions.

Blue Star Group is the parent company of two fast-fashion accessory brands in Latam: Todomoda and Isadora, which are trendy, affordable, and high-quality, and cater towards teens and young to mature woman.
BMB is a food company offering chocolate, Mediterranean sweets, healthy snacks, with two state-of-the-art food production facilities based in Dubai.
